website_summaries.verdict: Very popular cover that fits all toilet brands, with special quiet close feature to prevent slamming toilet seat covers.
pros: Quiet close feature – tap the cover and it self-closes slowly, avoiding loud slamming and cracks
Touch-button, easy release to facilitate cleaning beneath back cover mounts
cons: The seat apparently has some give, or flex, to it, which some may not like and which may put some stress on the mounting pegs in the long run

customer_reviews.title: Beyond all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The Bath Royale Premium Round Toilet Seat is the best toilet seat I ever owned, and I've owned many - I'm 87 years old. The quality is wonderful, it's very sleek and smart looking, and extremely comfortable. The installation directions are excellent. I installed the seat myself. It took me 30 minutes - it would have taken me 15 minutes 30 years ago. I never thought I would wind up at my age writing a love letter to a toilet seat, but if any toilet seat deserves it - it's this one.
customer_reviews.author: Vivianni

customer_reviews.title: The best seat available!
customer_reviews.text: These seats are definitely the best available. The mounting hardware is top-quality. The installation instructions are simple and clear. The seat may be plastic, but the construction feels solid (I prefer plastic over wood anyways). I love the quick release feature, and the fact that you only need to push the button once (not push and hold) to release the seat. Replaced both seats in our house with this product, and I couldn't be happier with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: N. Malczewsky

customer_reviews.title: Read me
customer_reviews.text: First time I have purchased a toilet seat outside of a major box retailer and holy smokes do you ever get more for your money. This thing is tough as nails, I don't know if I will use the removable feature but the hinge connections are as tight as I have ever seen, and rather than running a single bolt through the hinge and having your butt wiggle and loosen it, it uses a separate connection system. The slow close feature is sweet and the pads on the bottom where it rest son the boar seem like they will last a lot longer than the crap from ( insert big box hardware store name here ). Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: terrible product, unless you want high blood pressure, and a night of nightmare frustration
customer_reviews.text: So, it seemed like a great idea " quick release" for easy cleaning. Except apparently the quick release acts like Thor's hammer Mjolner, and will only release once it finds you worthy... (hint... you are never worthy) add that to the nightmare of this cheap ass instillation hardware. if cheap plastic "nuts" can be called "hardware" just when you think it is tightening, BAM! on slight little bump and it releases the bolt... the bolts now just slide around, the seat wont let go, and this is just one of those products that I will not send back because, come on!, its a toilet seat... who does that... do not waste your money on this... CANNOT STRESS ENOUGH. :(
customer_reviews.author: Z Q A

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this quiet close seat we bought another
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with our first purchase that we promptly bought another for the guest bathroom. Pretty easy for my husband to install, although they both slipped out of place at first and needed to be tightened. Wasn't difficult or a big deal though. First time removing the seat also took a little jiggling, but now it's easy peasy. Mostly just love the quiet close. No more slamming toilet wood seats. Nice to be able to remove for a deeper clean. Fits standard toilets well, seems durable and quality. Time will tell. Nice correspondence from sellers asking about our satisfaction and thanking for our purchases. Appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Carly C

customer_reviews.title: Found it, you have!
customer_reviews.text: Stop your search, you found it. Super easy to install, adjustable, soft close lid & push button to remove for easy cleaning. You get two bolt covers to choose from (white or stainless steel) plus there are rubber (?) feet on the bottom seat so no slipping only gripping. The soft concave design cradles your tush for a more comfortable seat. (I didn’t even know I needed this in my life, ah the little things!) Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bethy

customer_reviews.title: They will NOT stay tightened.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how tight we get the toilet seats (we bought 3 of them!), they are sliding way to the side within a week. We frankly do not know what else we can do but replace them. It was a lot of money WASTED and we've had them too long to return! We do like the fact that they shut slowly and quietly but everything else about them is the pits!!
customer_reviews.author: GARY RUSSELL

customer_reviews.title: flimsy seat that now won't stay tight
customer_reviews.text: I've dealt with this seat for a bit over a year and a half now. Decided to get here and write a review in hopes I could prevent a few people from buying this sorry excuse for a toilet seat. Disclaimer--I am 6'1" and 210#. I can't comfortably sit on this thing--it bends and feels like it is going to fall in..and now the screws that hold in on are failing. Off to look for something made of wood...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible (at least with the previous mounting hardware)
customer_reviews.text: Despite following the instructions carefully, the seat won't stay put and slides to the side. I got in touch with the manufacturer and they replied asking if I had the latest version of the mounting hardware because if not, they would send it to me. I replied that no, I didn't have the new mounting hardware and would like to receive it. No reply. I emailed again. No reply. So I guess I have to find a different toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: hovercraft

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty with this seat as it would not stay permanently in place. I placed a call to the President and he quickly sent me an additional part. When that didn't work, we determined that my toilet was so old that the holes were too small for this hardware to work properly. He sent me different hardware which I received two days later. This solved the problem and the seat sits solidly now. It is a very nice seat and removes easily for through cleaning. The customer service is superb to any I have ever encountered. I gave the mounting system 5 stars which refers to the correct mounting that I later received.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Best toilet seat!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toilet seat! We like it because it was easy to install and super easy to clean. The seat is very comfortable and doesn't stain because it's made out of a really durable plastic that has a very nice look to it. You can't go wrong with this brand and I'm definitely buying another one for my other bathroom in my house when the seat is ready to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality.’
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 units. One unit is perfect but the 2nd unit is defective. The bolts connecting the unit to the toilet are tight underneath but the seats shifts dangerously to the side. Perhaps new bolts would correct this but I don’t have company info any more. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Private1

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it seems
customer_reviews.text: This seat was easily to install but it came loose within 18 months and could never be tightened all the way. This means that it slides side to side and front to back. I need to reposition it every time I sit down. It has this easy to clean detachment system but now that it’s a couple of years old the chrome paint has started to wear off the plastic hinges and it looks awful. This got good reviews from so many people but turned out to be a huge disappointment. I bought an elongated seat for my other bathroom and have had even more problems with that one. I would not recommend this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Don't look any further, this is your Throne!
customer_reviews.text: So.............You can pay $19 for a toilet seat or $219, ........ Or how about $39! The $19 ones are not made well enough, you might get by for a while but you know it won't last and it just doesn't feel right. $219......really, why would you need to spend $219 for a toilet seat. The Marcobelle Company has designed and manufactured one of those products that when they come along, you just know. Excellent communication, fast ship, nice follow up and well made product that's easy to install. Like I said, look no further, just pull the trigger on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: Best Seat I’ve Owned
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet seat. Comfortable. Well designed for easy cleaning It won’t stain from using cleaners like other toilet seats. Installation design allows for a number of different size toilets. I’m very pleased. The only flaw is that the nuts supplied with the seat are weak. The concept is great in theory, but I’d recommend buying 1/4 inch nuts and 1 1/4 inch diameter washers made for 1/4 inch bolts. Then you can tighten and properly secure the seat down without it ever moving.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny_Y_Mac

customer_reviews.title: Plastic nuts don't hold well, making the seat useless.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic nuts are designed to wedge into the porcelain hole in your toilet seat as the bolt is screwed in, making for a tight grip and keeping the bolt in place. I'm sure it's a great design in theory, but in practice the bolts never screw in tight enough -- after a certain point they just keep spinning in place. And unless they are firmly in place the nuts will not hold the first time you try to lift or lower the seat, rendering the seat unusable. It's not worth the money until they come with a better plastic nut.
customer_reviews.author: rygreene

customer_reviews.title: Loved the first one so much,  bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago I bought this toilet seat for the toilet in our bathroom. It looks great, but my favorite thing about it is that it closes quietly (doesn't slam) on its own. It's easy to keep clean as well. When the time came to replace the toilet seat in our second bathroom, I went straight back to my Amazon Order History and hit "buy again" (was happy they're still available). Also, it arrived next day which is rare (currently due to COVID/shipping delays) and very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great seats that make for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed, wish I would have bought this seat a long time ago. The install is very easy all you need is a phillips screwdriver and 10mins, follow the simple instructions and your done. I bought 2 of these seats to replace worn out old seats and they work great, one is on an old toilet from the 1950s and it work great and look awesome on it. I don't have any issues with the seat wobbling or anything like that they come off great with the simple press of the button as long as you follow the simple instructions.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Loose grip
customer_reviews.text: The seat looses its grip and I am under 5ft and 108 lbs. I bought it because of the stellar reviews but I am very disappointed. No matter how often my husband (Mr. Fixit) replaces it, it will invariably slip. After 3 years of annoyance and discomfort, I am finally replacing it with another brand and without that quick-release feature. Frankly, I rarely needed to remove the seat for cleaning. I can clean a toilet quite well without taking the seat off.
customer_reviews.author: Red Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a 2020 Grand Design 310GK-R and one of the first things we switched out was the toilet seat. In our case, we spent close to $100k on this rig and you'd think with that kind of money they'd offer a better toilet seat. With that said, Grand Design (and others) needs to partner with Bath Royale and have these seats installed in all their trailers. We love the easy cleaning of this seat as well as the appearance. This is a solid, well made seat that would compliment any RV bathroom. Super easy to install w/ clear concise directions. Shipping was super fast and we are very happy with this investment. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID REXROAD

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a defective product
customer_reviews.text: This is a defective product. Before you buy this you should know that the screw mounts are actually plastic. I bought this product, and I'll let you know I have installed quite a few toilet seats in my time. Screwing The screws in completely stripped the plastic mounts. The screws are metal, mounts are plastic. What could go wrong? I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Devine

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult to Install
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to install. The mounts are very adjustable, and must be aligned perfectly to get the seat to fit the toilet symmetrically. The mounting/adjustment screws are partially covered by the installed seat, so the seat must be removed and reinstalled, multiple times, to move the seat to a proper, symmetric position on the toilet. Unfortunately, if the screws are even slightly misaligned, the seat is VERY hard to remove to adjust the screw positions. Lastly, even (finally!) installed correctly, the seat is not that easy to remove and reinstall for cleaning, as claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Helper

customer_reviews.title: Lid removes for ease of cleaning.  No slam lid.
customer_reviews.text: I had these installed by a plumber, as I was also installing bidets and I'm too crippled to do it myself. There are two features that I dearly love. First, the lid removes easily for cleaning. Secondly, the lid never slams -- no matter what. Finally, it works very well with the bidets we installed on both toilets. If there were any criticism it would be that I'd prefer they were somewhat more rigid. The reasons for that are, heavier people may damage the seat and the seat has a tendency to compress the water line to the bidets. However, if you are about 250 lbs or less, you should have no real problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Save the old plastic nuts from old seat or buy some nuts before installing!
customer_reviews.text: Install the seat as instructions state. The install is a little bit more difficult than a regular install because it allows for adjustment of the seat. The plastic nuts included will strip because the plastic nut assembly is not long enough in the threaded area. After the nuts included strip leave them in place and use the old or newly bought nuts to tighten the seat securely. Great seat except for the poorly engineered nuts. The manufacturer is advised to include 2 extra regular nuts to backup the plastic nut assembly until they can get the proper nut assembly made.
customer_reviews.author: mazdarotarytech

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install if you follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised that others said this was difficult to install. I read the instructions through before I started and found it very easy to install. Product feels sturdy and well made. I needed to replace all the toilet seats in my house since they are the originals installed 20 years ago. After installing the first one, I just ordered three more for the other toilets in my house.
customer_reviews.author: SATXLady

customer_reviews.title: Impression Installation Directions
customer_reviews.text: This seat was much easier to install than I expected. It was done in 10 minutes and all I needed was a screwdriver. It closes softly with just a fingertip just as advertised. There is no big bang when it closes. And, it's very easy to open normally, too. The lid seems strong enough to sit on. I wouldn't stand on it, though. The plastic seems like it would crack under that weight.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect toilet seat. It is easy to mount, nice slow close, easy release. And it has two qualities that are the most important for me. It does not stain: I have two young boys and some other toilet seats started getting yellowy. It is strong, not bendy: I sit on the toilet seat all the time, even stand on it sometimes, this one does not have that annoying bend or flex that some plastic seats have. I've also dealt with the customer service of this company and they are incredible. They totally stand by their warranty and are just so nice to boot. Get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great Products-Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second seat I have purchased because the first was terrific. It’s sleek, well constructed and conforms to all they claim. I had a small problem with the second one (partially my fault) I called Bath Royale and they returned my call within 10 minutes. Mark immediately knew the problem and sent replacement screws which arrived in 2 days!! I just spent 5 minutes attaching it and it’s perfect! When I ever look for related items, I will always go to Bath Royale first. Their products and service are unsurpassed!!
customer_reviews.author: T l.

customer_reviews.title: great seat - comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: overall this is a great product. super comfortable. wife didn't like it at first, now she prefers it. will change the other toilet to use this seat. it has a unique mounting solution that makes it possible to adjust to almost any toilet bolt configuration. and it has a completely separate seat release mechanism that lets you remove the entire seat with a click of a button. this makes cleaning (literally) a snap. only drawback is close rate, which you will see reviews commenting about. it closes super slow. perhaps this would be remedied if they used a heavier material. at any rate, i'm buying another one, so it can't be that bad, right? =)
customer_reviews.author: Honda

customer_reviews.title: Quality toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very quick and easy. A little bit different than a standard toilet seat, since the quick release base pieces have to be adjusted to align with the holes in the toilet seat, but it only took a minor adjustment to get everything to fit together. The slow close of the toilet seat is a nice upgrade from our old seat that would slam shut if dropped too early, and the seat itself is also more comfortable than our old toilet seat. Have not used the quick release for cleaning yet, but I imagine it will be handy when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: scottw

customer_reviews.title: Seat Won't Release - Will Not Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Sounded like a great idea and the seat has served its purpose for a cheap plastic molded seat, but when I tried to pull the whole seat off, one side will not release. No amount of wiggling, tugging, or prying will budge it... and yes, that is with the release button fully pushed in. Save your money and buy a cheap plastic seat. That way you won't be disappointed when it craps out (pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: missibecky

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible, buy a different one
customer_reviews.text: This was a 5 star toilet seat when we first got it. Slow close is good, removable is good, install was easy, it feels fine to sit on. Had it since February 2019. It's now terribly scratched and stained and the chrome plated mounting covers are chipping and stained. It's so disgusting that we have to buy a new one. The original toilet seat lasted for 20+ years and didnt look this bad when we replaced it. We didnt do anything different with this one. Maybe this is the way things are made nowadays, but that doesnt mean I have to like it. If I had it to do over, I would order a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Firedaddy

customer_reviews.title: Different, but Effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with little to go on. The reviews gave me more incentive to buy. The mechanism is different, but is very effective. It is above and beyond the typical wooden designs which aren't very secure even after tightening the plastic screws and wingnuts. The stainless steel screws and reinforced mounting bases makes it worth paying a premium for and the seat is comfortable. The slow closing mechanism is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: theFallenMarvel

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly seat
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since March and I thought it was the best toilet seat I have ever bought but now I can't wait to buy a replacement. It has a lot of good features and that is why I bought it in the first place but now it won't stay in one place. It keeps getting loose so constantly have to tighten the screws which doesn't help much because it just loosens again. I am glad I had bought it at the lower price but it is definitely not worth the $60 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done
customer_reviews.text: I was a little uncertain switching to a plastic toilet seat but after reading the reviews on Amazon I decided to go with the Bath Royale. Was very easy to install and the push-button removal makes it very easy to clean underneath. The way the seat is designed is also different than other seats I have had and is very comfortable. The only thing I was surprised at was there is more back and forth movement than I was expecting from the seat when it is secured on the posts. It's not extreme, but if you shift your weight it's more of an occasional annoyance. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Working great in my small Class-B cargo van size RV
customer_reviews.text: Seller delivered on time and arrived well packaged. A bit different installation but that's because of the unique adjustable and the easy removal/clean. My RV toilet base is ceramic but has a different shape in the back so I wasn't sure if a standard seat would fit. So in searching I found this one, and it is great! The slow close has worked flawlessly when I've had to slam on the brakes (CA driving is not for the faint of heart) closing without me even hearing it, versus my old seat would SLAM shut and of course broke. Make sure you watch the video on the install which is really nice addition to the also-good print instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Got this toilet seat based on previous reviews. I agree with the others as this is a high quality product. Before purchasing, I've measured my toilet and compared to the instructions posted on the product page. Product came in a well packaged box, without any defects. Mounting instructions are clear and easy to follow. Installation took maybe 10min and is a perfect fit to my 20+ years old toilet. Nice high gloss finish, slow lid closing mechanism works very well and has a clever button to easily disengage the seat from the toilet for cleaning purposes. Overall a great product, functional and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: the design is creative with the lift-off pins.. ...
customer_reviews.text: the design is creative with the lift-off pins...maybe too creative that they don't lock the seat in place as tight as other designs. the soft close is also a soft open...meaning it has resistance to opening the lid. my preschooler has issues getting it to stay open. lastly is the design of the lid is a recessed style. there is a ridge/lip that will dig into your back and hurts. cleaver picture angles hide this fact.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the third toilet seat I have purchase in the last 2-3 years, and by far the best so far. I had previously bought a comparable model by Kohler each time. Kohler's Installation was poor and the seat would break at the seam after some time, and our family is not overweight. I wanted a change and went by the reviews. Not only was the price cheaper by a couple dollars than the Kohler, installation is much better and product seems much better. So much so I am considering replacing our other bathroom seat with this product. We've had this product only a couple months, but very happy and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Who would have thought a toilet seat could be so great?
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to pay $40 for a toilet seat but now that I have it and its installed I don't regret it one bit. The company clearly care about their customers. I received an email shortly after with some tips and instructions for assembly once it arrived. It cam earlier then the estimated delivery. Everything was packaged well. No scratches or dents. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. It took under 5 minutes to install. The set included an additional stainless steel bolt covers but I opted for the white matching ones. Overall, it looks amazing and its so comfortable to sit on. I would buy this product again for all my bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Hboyce98

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the best one, replace this one over the old Kohler that finally give up and crack. Kohler was much expensive on sale 89.99$. So yes lot more comfortable and way better quality. This one claims to hold on top 400 Lb. No it's not. I can easily band the top in my hand. Shape not matches my toilet, rubber bumpers not sitting properly. Yes it's easy to install and removable future for easy cleaning was great. Overall just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: nice design and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding toilet seats that fit the toilets on my boat. I have a Jabsco model 37245. The seat design was clever. It allowed for bolt distance adjustment to accommodate variations in the mounting holes on the toilet. Seat overhang was minimal. Just enough to lift the seat without touching the bowl. The soft close feature is a welcome feature. The pads on the underside on the seat seemed to be built in. My last seat the pads were poorly attached and one ended up in the toilet jamming the motor. (Sadly, I've become proficient at taking these toilets apart.) Easy installation even if your from Rio Linda. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Art Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: My butt loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really sold on these, having purchased 2 now. The mounting system is unique, but easy to install. The mounts are rubber on the bottom, so they simply don't move under use. The whole seat is easily removed for cleaning. The seat materials and shape are comfortable. The only complaint I can muster is that it closes a little too slowly. That said, you can push it closed if you want without damaging the mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: King on the Throne.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this fella up based on reviews. I wasn’t disappointed. Installation was easier when I looked at the instructions but overall it was easy. The soft close is the money shot. Soo nice to be able to close the seat up and not worry about slapping my twig and berries in it. It closes really slow and is pretty much silent. The seat itself makes you feel like you’re in a castle. Super comfy and feels like I should wipe one last time before I leave. I feel like a king on the throne.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: Needed the round seat. None in the area where we live. I didn't look at the reviews, my fault, was so happy to find a no slam lid that was round. Wife looked at it and ordered it. Different setting up. Mainly the screws under the toilet were the tough part. Had to push on them while screwing the screw into the nut. If not the screw would just turned and won't hook up with the nut. But got it done, like the lid and able to remove the whole seat if one wants to clean under it with just a push of a button is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Not Particularly An Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: And the directions seem a bit backwards. Took forever to install as I had to keep unscrewing it to get the alignment correct. Then once it was in place, I had to take it back apart to install the mounting base covers - because they are not mentioned in the directions until AFTER the lid installation. Also, this is a cheap plastic lid. I wouldn't consider it "premium" by any stretch of the imagination. The slow close is REALLY slow....but it does work. Should have returned it and shopped around for a wooden seat/lid like Church makes - which is super easy to install and really IS a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install. I did it in less than 5 minutes. It actually took longer to take off the $12 Walmart piece of junk that the plastic hinges broke within the first three months. The plastic bolts were a mile long seemed like. The bath royale was so much easier and I believe it will be durable and last a while. The only thing that caught me off guard was the box that was in huge big letters that said Made in China. I am under the impression now that this product is made in China and distributed in US???
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second seat. Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: After having one for 3 or 4 months, I bought a second one of these toilet seats. I was used to replacing my “wooden” toilet seat every year or so after it would get super gross under the rim. I hadn’t tried a plastic seat, but just assumed that plastic = cheaper. Turns out, plasic is a great material for toilet seats. The original seat I bought still looks brand new. At this point, my wooden seats would be showing signs of disgustingness, even after thorough cleaning. These Bath Royals seats are easy to install, easy to keep clean, and work well. I would definitely buy another. We
customer_reviews.author: Lajefe

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Stay in Place
customer_reviews.text: Great seat - very comfortable. Closes quietly as advertised. The quick release is a nice feature which you'll come to appreciate even more due to frequently having to remove the seat to re-position and re-tighten the mounting bolts. This seat has been installed for just over a month and has had to be re-positioned/tightened twice. That's an average of about once every two weeks. Not what I'd call an acceptable failure rate.
customer_reviews.author: Just Watching

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: We got this when our old flimsy toilet seat broke, I was a little concerned buying a toilet seat on line but my 15 year old son installed it before I even got home from work. The installation was easy and quick. I love that the seat is sturdy and doesn't feel like it's going to break when you sit on it. I also like the slow to close feature so no more slamming toilet seats in the middle of the night. Would definitely buy again if needed & I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these to replace the painted wood versions the builder installed on my toilets. They had gotten stained to the point where no amount of cleaning could remove the stains. These BathRoyale seats were a breeze to install and adjust to just the right fit. The quiet close feature is great and cleanup is much easier. The easy "remove the seat" feature for complete cleaning is a real bonus. I highly recommend you spend a few extra $$ and get these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing great build
customer_reviews.text: I have bought all kinds on toilet seats this thing is Stout it's amazing strong very comfortable easy to clean button release seat for easy clean, very very sturdy first toilet seat in a long time that has no notion amazing don't think about it if your looking for a comfortable easy to clean well built toilet seat buy it
customer_reviews.author: Justintime

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these toilet seats, one round and one elongated. Replaced an expensive toilet seat and an inexpensive toilet seat and was embarrassed I had not replaced them before. Much better design, so easy to install, very stable on the toilet, shiny clean and so easy to keep that way. They have a two year warranty, but I know I will never have to use it. If you have big people among your family or friends purchase this toilet seat for your peace of mind and their safety--Handles 400lbs on the cover!
customer_reviews.author: HRM

customer_reviews.title: I'm a plastic convert....
customer_reviews.text: For some reason when I think of plastic I think of a cheap quality product. I have always went with wood seats. However, they would eventually chip and/or stain. Not so with plastic. I thought plastic would be cold. Not so. And this seat closes nice and slow, or you can manually move the seat down quickly. Some engineer really thought things through with this seat. Everything about it is well designed, it even looks good. Well worth spending a few bucks more for something you will wind up using every day, and will last a long time. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful solution
customer_reviews.text: We needed new toilet seats to replace old wooden ones that made a huge, loud noise when closing. I was tired of hearing them and they had become hard to clean. While looking for replacements, slow closing seats showed up on my screen. Sounded like a good solution and looked nice. I read the reviews for this model and was impressed. So I ordered one. It was so easy to install, easy to clean, and lovely in its silence, that I ordered another. We are very happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen V Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Be clean! Save Money & TP!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans refreshingly!! I decided to get this instead of hoarding TP during quarantine. Best decision and will use a bidet forever now! You need separate hook-up for hose to a hot water valve fyi. I have little, soft washcloths hanging on cute hook for water wiping. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Honest

customer_reviews.title: I'd prefer a stronger lid and a little more seat.
customer_reviews.text: The lid gives (bends) just slightly when I sit on top. I'm 120#. The rim you sit on is slightly narrower than I'd like. I found it quite difficult to adjust the screws but once I got it in the right place it was secure. It doesn't slip. It will be easy to clean. It closes quietly. I'll keep it because I think the finish will hold up to humidity and be easy to clean. I'd prefer a stronger lid and a little more seat.
customer_reviews.author: mary jo

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as others
customer_reviews.text: It's been a year and no matter what, it wiggles and slides. I much prefer the Kohler quick-release seats in our other bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: H & R Scully

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: While this toilet seat mounts a little differently, I really like the concept and I like that it is going to be easy to remove and clean! I am a 70-year old woman, just followed the instructions and had no problem installing this. I like the easy close feature too.
customer_reviews.author: The Catservant

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This seat was great for a few months. After a little challenge installing. Not even 6 mos now and it started shifting a little, then within a week shifting a lot and will not stay still. Plastic screws. We can not fix it, so Back to the basic toilet seat for us.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Amato

customer_reviews.title: A-ma-zing!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my toilet seat! I can’t believe I just said that, I’m not normal lol. But for real you need one of these! There is a reason it has so many good reviews, because it’s totally awesome. I installed it with little more than a philips screw driver and my own two hands. So easy! And I didn’t know I needed a soft close toilet lid until now, such a nice feature and this toilet is sturdy! Do your butt a favor and get this thing! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Poodlelicious81

customer_reviews.title: THIS TOILET SEAT IS A MUST!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST TOILET SEAT EVER and I have been through a lot of seats! I loved it so much I replaced all the toilet seats in my house with this one! It's SUPER EASY to install, it took me about 5 minutes. I LOVE how with a push of a button you can take the seat off to clean. I have little boys and they pee everywhere. The other seats were hard keep clean which made the bathroom smell, not this one! The seat is comfortable and it's slow closing so no accidents with my little boys or loud slamming. You won't be disappointed if you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice seat, but slides
customer_reviews.text: This plastic toilet is probably the best in this media you can buy. However it slips once installed and it keeps needing to be realigned by retightening the screws. I think this could be helped with rubber or cork washers so the screw would not loosen. I still give it four stars since it is made so well and I think I can make it work for just a few cents. It is super easy to clean and appears it will stay nice looking for much longer than wood. Overall I would say try it! The one I purchased was for round toilet bowls and not oblong. It fits very nicely on the round bowl.
customer_reviews.author: HopeRose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent adjustable fit and attachment hardware
customer_reviews.text: We had the problem of an older, just slightly larger-than-standard sized bowl that previous attempts to fit with a modern replacement seat failed. It was only a question of a quarter inch in depth, but that can make a huge esthetic and sanitary and ergonomic difference. Given this product's just slightly larger size and adjustable pegs , its coverage of the bowl was perfect. Might add the anchoring hardware was also higher quality than the major, more expensive premium brand seat that we'd previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Lackland

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how EASY and PRECISE your instructions are. CONGRATULATIONS! I'm a 69-year-old widow and the hardest part was removing the existing toilet seat. It is a lovely toilet seat if I can say that. It was simple to install and looks beautiful. I love the construction of the seat and especially like the overhang in the front. The best part is that it is removable for cleaning -- I haven't purchased a toilet seat in many years and this is totally new to me -- what a fabulous feature. Thank you for your quality product. I look forward to many years of enjoyment!!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Round high quality toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: The home we moved to has two very cold bathrooms and tiny hard and cold toilet seats made of painted wood product. I was looking for a larger seat that was more comfortable and less cold. In my searching found this. Got it on and it was so much improvement that we purchased another for 2nd bath! Can't give much higher compliment than another purchase. Also for the comment regarding difficult install or anything else, no way! Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay up when put up
customer_reviews.text: This got so many solid reviews, thought it was worth mentioning this experience. Due to the springs that prevent the falling lid, when you lift the inner lid, it tends to want to fall back immediately (there is spring back-pressure), so while it does fall slowly, the point was opening it... have to push it up a few times, or hold it there for 4-5 seconds... way to much for the pleasure of a $55 plastic toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Fraugher

customer_reviews.title: Great Soft Close, Chrome Caps are JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd seat I have installed. All my toilets now have this seat. Appearance and Soft Close feature is fantastic. But, after using for a short while, the seat started moving. To stop this I had to really tighten the base screws. Downside and reason for 4 stars, is the chrome cover caps. The chrome plating turned green and flaked off after being in use only a short time. This was on more than one of the seats, so it's not an isolated problem. Threw those away and installed the white plastic covers, that also come in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Like A King on his Throne
customer_reviews.text: Actual purchaser, product user, and now great fan! Seat was easy to install, and while installation was intuitive, instructions were detailed and descriptive. Slowly closing seat is nice feature, but even better are the quality components - screws, washers ,spacers, and fasteners all had solid feel and were properly grooved to provide tight fit and stability. Plastic seat is intelligently shaped, and - Hooray! - comfortable. Found price to be very reasonable. Registered seat (it has a two year warranty) at company website on a Sunday afternoon, and had a confirmation later that same day - that’s wonderful service. Likely to replace less quality seat in other bathroom based on this positive experience.
customer_reviews.author: stewfed

customer_reviews.title: Just bought our second one
customer_reviews.text: We have been pleased with the sturdiness of the first Bath Royale soft close seat we bought, so I just bought another one. I installed both myself (67-year old woman with some home maintenance abilities) and found it easy enough - although not a total walk in the park. One just needs to go slowly. I could do a third one no problem but the installation is not intuitive, so following directions is critical, including when one first puts the mounting screws on (first you push them on--never have done that before). Once everything was done, I marvelled at its ingenuity. I recommend this toilet seat and will probably buy another one for our cottage.
customer_reviews.author: SF Bay Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  Product from a great company!
customer_reviews.text: I lost a part during while installing my seat. I called Mark and asked about buying a new part. He not only sent me the part I needed at no cost, he sent me a better option for my particular installation after finding out the difficulty that I’s been having. With the top mount toggle anchor that he provided, the installation took just minutes. It was so simple! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of the seat. We haven’t had it too long I think less than six months but it’s still going strong. I am hoping this one will last and not crack like the other brand that we bought last time. This says it’s higher rated material and should last. We liked it so much we bought another. My only complaint is that the mountings come loose overtime, but that’s easily fixed by giving them a quick tighten. I’m very, very pleased with this seat and would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: LovinLife

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet seat arrived when promised, in minimum but adequate packing materials, and with clear, detailed installation instructions. It is easy to install and the installation materials were packaged already assembled in the correct order to eliminate confusion (you just separate them to attach the seat to the toilet). The quick removal feature of the seat allows for thorough cleaning and then quick replacement of the seat. The seat is attractive and most important, closes silently and slowly. In all, the unit was exactly as advertised and is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stillworking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat delivered on its promise of installation and cleaning ease. The instructions were very clear; the process was easy to accomplish, and the toilet is indeed a snap to remove for deep cleaning. The self-closing seat feature works perfectly. We've only had it a couple of weeks, so I can't comment about its durability and performance over time. It is heavy, solid plastic, though, and the seat lid does indeed sturdily support the weight of a large human! So far, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spot ON!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have always had problems with the original toilet seats that came with the ToTo round toilets we have. The seats would always loosen and begin to slide sideways. They were terrible to try and clean...only way to properly clean them was to unbolt and remove them, which is a pain. The Bath Royale Premium Round Toilet Seats are the answer...press a button and boom the seat slide off for easy access to clean...wonderful!!! A GREAT IDEA. I bought two and now I'm going to buy one for our 5th wheel trailer too! March 1, 2019 I just installed the newest purchase in the RV and it fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: J. Todd

customer_reviews.title: This seat is definitely the real "Iron Throne" aka fit for a King/ Queen.  Best I've seen.
customer_reviews.text: It says I purchased this last year January 2018, where did the time fly!? This seat is AMAZING. The mounting screws basically came assembled in the order in which they needed to be put on and there was nothing complicated about it. The seat is definitely quality and I would not hesitate to buy this again and recommend it to everyone on Amazon looking for a quality soft close seat. I had set my seat up with toilet bars on the side for senior citizens to support themselves when sitting and getting up and had no issues with fitting that with this seat either. Great product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Siddiqi

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware. Pictures do not show crevasses on bottom
customer_reviews.text: Who would design a toilet seat with crevasses? Although not a single picture shows this, the bottom molded piece has crevasses that are going to make this a cleaning nightmare! Right where a guy would urinate is an indentation if he aims poorly. Is this a joke? Too late for me to return this now!
customer_reviews.author: J. Somma

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase 😁
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old (wooden) seat, which had scratches and worn out cushions. The new Bath Royale toilet seat was easy to install, required a little extra time to align correctly (no issues), and was a great upgrade ! It’s very easy to clean and love the way it slowly goes down (no more hard slams). It remains tight over time from the installation, so no nuisance re-tightening necessary !!
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This seat was super easy to install and looks awesome! The slow close feature is great. It’s been very easy to clean too. It’s a nice bright white color too and matches the rest of my toilet perfectly. I have been using wood seats for years but they are too porous and difficult to keep clean. I can tell that this seat material will hold up much better. A great purchase all around!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Owens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Waited way too long for a slow close toilet seat in guest bathroom. This was very easy to install and adjust for the proper fit. The design for adjusting is super easy to figure out one you have the seat in place. I liked the little button to push allowing you to easily detach the seat so you can have an unobstructed access to the screws. Do not try and tighten it with the seat on. Remove the seat and tighten the screws and you are done.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lee

customer_reviews.title: New lid for the throne
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and decided to get it for myself. Reviews were spot on. Easy to install, wasy to clean, slow and safe close and its in a true white color. Goes perfect in my restroom since my other was old and flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Chill636

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and function. Slippery feet.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace the painted wood seat that came with Dometic 320 toilet for an airstream trailer. Perfect color match and good hardware included. 5 minute easy install. Comfortable seat. Nice fit and function. Only con is the feet are slick plastic and don’t grip the bowl rim. Problem with OEM seat. Slipping feet puts more stress and failure on the hinge. Minus one star. Kohler seat at home has better grippers. Small space probably twist more during use.
customer_reviews.author: Smokeydog

customer_reviews.title: Fixed wiggly seat problem
customer_reviews.text: The attachment method eliminated the wiggly seat issue on my toilet caused by slightly misaligned holes in the base. And the fact that the seat can be adjusted to some extent right or left and front to back makes it even better. And the seat is fairly comfortable IMO. The pop-off feature for cleaning is nice and easy to do. The seat was easy to install and I liked that there were two cap cover options (colored to match the seat and chrome). Finally, excellent install directions with very good illustrations. Installing is not rocket science but nice to have instructions that are easy to ready, completely illustrated and leaves nothing out .. and all in big print.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Regalla

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: The seat has a fantastic mounting system that allows the seat to be perfectly centered, aligned and adjusted while installing before final tightening it down in place. I am a retired plumber that did new houses and have installed thousands of toilets & seats. This seat is an outstanding value and the soft close is smooth and quiet. The quick removal aspect is what also sets it apart as it will not pop off like other designs for quick removal. The fit & finish on this seat is superb, quality is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in my RV
customer_reviews.text: My RV has a Thetford Porcelain toilet, the seat was cheap junk. Put this on and much more comfortable sitting on a solid seat! The no slam feature keeps me from dropping the lid during the night, waking p my wife. Installation was tricky, trying to keep it centered. The bottom of the seat is slightly convex so cleaning is harder than a seat that the bottom is flat. I still give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: AK Travler

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Pricy, But Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a toilet seat, it's comfortable, feels solid, and the slow-close feature is really nice. I don't have to hear my younger children slamming the seat down on accident anymore. Also, it was really easy to install and adjust. The instructions were easy to follow, and the info on the discription before even buying the seat made it easy to ensure I was buying the right size and color. Overall, it's a bit pricy, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Atoe

customer_reviews.title: Seat loosens on a regular basis!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are great seats. Very easy to pop off to clean; however, the seat will not stay tightly in place. My husband manages to wiggle it so loose that I fear he will slide right off the toilet one of these days. I am able to tighten it by hand as a temporary measure, but it really needs to be taken apart each time to be securely seated. Maybe someone else has this problem too. If so have you come up with a solution???
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ware

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use, easy to clean. Closes slowly & quietly.
customer_reviews.text: The installation hardware is genius, the seat is genius. Well-made, seems more solid than plastic seats you can buy at typical chain hardware stores, and the soft-close action works beautifully. Made in the USA. Read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be intimidated because it is a little different to install. It’s the smartest design I have ever seen and the installation was very easy. It fit perfectly on my Kohler. The stress points on the hinges are made to take a lot of weight and sway, but as long as you tighten it properly, it’s not going to move. That’s important to know because people sometimes sit on the cover like a seat to moisturize. That is what causes them to break. It is comfortable and closes nicely too. I am confident that this one is going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different experience with 2 toilets
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 round seats for two toilets of different manufactures. One installed in a few minutes with little to no fitting or adjustment. Had alignment problems with the second one. Dragging on pins during connect and disconnect. Pins were not perpendicular to toilet mount. Bent pins to get a decent fit. Took an extra 1/2 hour. Probably wouldn't be an issue if the 1st one hadn't installed so easily. Overall, I like the product quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Erv Gravening

customer_reviews.title: Why does this have such good reviews?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this toilet seat for one year. The seat itself is very sturdy and seat lowers slowly as advertised. The problem is it it’s always slipping and sliding all over the place. The screw and bolt have to be continuously tightened. Everyone is complaining.. I just bought a new Kohler toilet seat, I am done. This one goes in garbage..
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Best Toliet Seat Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best toilet seat ever created! We got this for our 5th Wheel and couldn't be happier. I'm a die-hard clean freak and the fact that I can completely remove the toilet seat with just a push of a button to clean under the nasty edge of the toilet seat is AMAZING!!! When we purchase our next home I already told my husband we're purchasing one of these toilet seats for every bathroom in the home! Money well spent! Oh, also, the lid slow closes so no more lids crashing down in the middle of the night! Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Desirae S.

customer_reviews.title: Bath Royale BR620-00 is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Our old toilet seat broke and we needed a replacement in the middle of the Pandemic. We were housebound. I took a chance and ordered one from Amazon. Bath Royale contacted me with instructions prior to the toilet seat's arrival. The seat is perfect! This is a couple of weeks later. We, in New Jersey, are still housebound. Our Royale toilet seat is still making us smile. Thank you for your service. The Bath Royale lives up to its name!
customer_reviews.author: Janie F. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I never really gave much thought to toilet seats before. We had a broken slow closer to replace. And wanted another slow closer. I came across this, and I think 85% of almost 4,000 reviews were five star. After reading the description and some reviews I decided to purchase this. Very impressive. Comfortable, easy to remove and clean, isn’t cold to the touch. Feels very solid. Installation isn’t difficult. Just a little different.
customer_reviews.author: Becky K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and the slow close feature works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: The Bath Royale BR620-00 Round White Toilet Seat has been great so far. It was very easy to follow the directions to install, and the seat seems very secure. While is seems much thinner and a little more flimsy than the wooden toilet seat it is replacing, it seems like it will wear much better in the long run. The slow closing feature works very well and is silent. The alignment process can take some playing around with, but overall it was not hard to do and it seems to be a very solid connection once in place. My wife and I have been enjoying it, as much as one can enjoy a toilet seat!
customer_reviews.author: Kujo

customer_reviews.title: Fits and Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! My poor 3 year old's "peepee" got crushed when the toilet lid we had fell on it! I went on Amazon and bought this one right away, and I'm so glad I did. It was super easy to install, I like that it had the choice of chrome or white finishings (the chrome looks really nice and matches my bathroom well), and of course most importantly it does what it is supposed to and closes very slowly. Well worth the price, does not feel cheap at all. Fit my round Kohler perfectly. My sweet baby's privates are safe now :)
customer_reviews.author: Elsa B

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, buy this now.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how excited I am about a toilet seat! I've never had to buy, replace, or switch out a toilet seat before, but it was sooo easy and totally painless... And I saw a few people complaining in the questions about the price changing after they bought it..."it's a great seat, but why did the price go up?" Because it's a great toilet seat!!! Just enjoy it. I paid 40 dollars, and it was money well spent. I can't recommend this highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ann

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: The quick-release mechanism doesn't work very well on my commode, but I suspect it's because my commode isn't quite standard--the bolt-holes aren't quite the regulation distance apart, apparently. The plastic seat is comfortable, but the lid has more give in it than a wooden one would have, as you might expect. I bought this seat to replace a Bemis Mayfair seat because a hinge on the Bemis seat broke, and *Bemis doesn't sell replacement hinges*!
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, seems well designed
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 10 minutes to install this seat, most of which was just reading the directions. Installing a 2nd one now that I know what to do would probably take about 3 minutes. It seems well designed and made. The slope from the outside of the seat to the inside towards the bowl seems steeper than it needs to be, but hasn't caused any issues for anyone so far. Right now, I'm happy with the purchase. Will be buying a 2nd one for another bathroom. I'll update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sundquist

customer_reviews.title: Keeps slipping on toilet seat.  Not as comfortable as my last one but decent!
customer_reviews.text: Just moved it from 4 to 2 stars. I’ve had it a few months and the seat just keeps slipping. It does not grip the toilet barely at all. **** So I had a wooden soft close before, but felt it stained too easily so I went with an easier to clean plastic. This one had great reviews so I bought it. I’m not sure I quite like the shape/feel of the seat but maybe I’ll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie W

product_meta.title: Toilet Seat Round BATH ROYALE BR620-00 White Premium Round Toilet Seat Slow Close, Replacement Toilet Seat Fits All Toilet Brands including Kohler, Toto and American Standard
feature_bullets: FITS ALL TOILET BRANDS including Crane, Universal Rundle, Eljer, Delta, Bemis, Caroma and Gerber. Also fits toilets with non-standard mounting hole spacings 4.5-6.5 inches. IMPORTANT: BEFORE YOU ORDER, please measure your toilet bowl (see images) to determine if you need ROUND or ELONGATED size. NOTE: Bath Royal toilet seats are not compatible with bidets, grab bars or risers that install between the seat and bowl.

EASY TO CLEAN – Helps keep your bathroom smelling fresh and clean. One touch QUICK RELEASE immediately detaches seat/cover from toilet, eliminating the nasty area between the hinges where urine, grime and odor-causing germs usually collect. NOTE: When cleaning, do not spray or saturate the mounting bases or hinges. Spray your cloth first, then wipe.

NO LOUD SLAMMING – Slow Close prevents accidents including cracked toilets and pinched fingers. Simply tap forward and watch the seat and/or lid close silently and softly by themselves. Closing too slow? Push it closed. Unlike other brands, Bath Royale’s soft close can be forced closed repeatedly without issue. Great for everyone, including people with lower back pain because user doesn’t have to stoop or bend to lower the seat.

MORE SANITARY & STAIN RESISTANT - Made of polypropylene, a light, relatively soft plastic that is non-absorbent, chemical and stain resistant. Bath Royale uses 100% pure (not recycled) polypropylene because it is stronger and produces a beautiful, high-gloss finish. The seat and cover will flex, but guaranteed not to crack, break or permanently deform. Our polypropylene will last for years with proper care and cleaning, but scratches relatively easily (so avoid abrasives and hard sharp objects).

DURABLE & LONG LASTING - Tested to 400 pounds, all Bath Royale seats feature stainless steel mounting hardware that holds your seat firmly in place. 4 seat bumpers evenly distribute weight. Unlike painted wood or padded soft seats, Bath Royale seats are a solid color throughout and will not chip peel or fade. 2-YEAR WARRANTY is double most other brands.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,964 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
